articles.content: Were still a month or so out from Build, but Microsoft is doing a bit of a trial run this week in the form of an online-only event. Whats been billed as a Windows event is, predictably, focused on AI… [+2604 chars]

articles.title: China tests nuclear-powered 'shrinkable' engine for Mars spaceship - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Chinese scientists have allegedly made key technological breakthroughs that could help China build a nuclear-powered spaceship for Mars and beyond.
articles.content: According to the researchers, a nuclear-powered spacecraft could complete a round trip from Earth to Mars in just three months. The prevailing scientific consensus is that this technology will be vit… [+708 chars]
